page.title: 14THE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: There is a large{shopping centre}in the heart of Ponteland that includes a sports shop,two supermarkets and a newsagents.There is also a{Post office selling anything from the everyday stamp to exotic collectors items.There are also fashion shops,a betting shop, 2 bakers(Greggs of Gosforth and Gelders)and a travel agents. Here are some of the prices surveyed in Laws: Baked Beans at only 14p-36p Small Soups at 23p with a range of Tomato,Mushroom,Chicken and Vegetable. They also sell pet food. There is a largish fishmonger which sells things from kippers to rainbow trout.Fish and chips are also available at 90p.Other shops are a Butchers,Greengrocers,Babies Wear and an Off Licence.
